remarks: If the difference between two group elements is zero, they are equal. ( ~ subeq0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)
statement:
grpsubid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpsubid.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
grpsubid.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
grpsubeq0 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X .- Y ) = .0. <-> X = Y ) ) $.
